name: Oncoming Storm
description:
The player will start during one of the "Build-Ups" - a time of calm before an oncoming storm. During this time, the player needs to find the egg, find an Axe & Pickaxe tool hidden in the world somewhere, or they could start dragging Physics Objects over in order to start their barricade, which will protect them and the egg from the storm.

Good Luck!
